name: df-line3
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cline3, crab(s0, cpw(crr3c), wa(wbr(c2o, cdom, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wi(wne(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(crn(cptdfc(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cv(s0))))))))
comment: Define the set of all lines. A line is an infinite subset of ` RR3 ` that satisfies a ` PtDf ` property. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Jul-2012.)
